list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device for making and breaking the connection in an electric circuit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the guard hit a switch and the gate swung open

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of adopting one policy or way of life, or choosing one type of item, in place of another; a change, especially a radical one.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his friends were surprised at his switch from newspaper owner to farmer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn bè của anh ấy đã rất ngạc nhiên khi chuyển đổi từ chủ sở hữu tờ báo sang nông dân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slender, flexible shoot cut from a tree.
a tress of false or detached hair tied at one end, used in hairdressing to supplement natural hair.
change the position, direction, or focus of.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the company switched the boats to other routes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công ty đã chuyển các thuyền sang các tuyến khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: beat or flick with or as if with a switch.
